text: Kerry Joseph Donley (February 1, 1956 â€“ July 13, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. Washington Post, About the Candidates: Kerry J. Donley He was the Mayor of Alexandria, Virginia from 1996 to 2003. He also was the Chair of the Democratic Party of Virginia from 2003 to 2005. Donley died on July 13, 2022 at his home in Alexandria from a heart attack at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Kerry J. Donley
